Posts.Content: Hi, My mom has been treated for Breast Cancer last year.Although her therapies and treatments are over.. We feel she is not able to live her normal life. She is taking continous pills prescribed by Doctor. bt this is not all what she need.for e.g. 1) Her appetite has changed drastically. 2) Digestion power is affected 3) She needs to visit to Doctor(family doctor) every month. 4) Every second day she gets some pain in her body. 5)Her BP low down if she do more work. all above are few of the problems she is facing. im very much concerned about her health as i cant see her living like this.. I want help to get knowledge what should be Do's and Dont's after cancer treatment for her now. 1) what diet she must include 2) she must do her daily house hold work or not 3) Any kind of Yoga can help her i mean all information i can get about fighting with this CANCER Any help would be greatly appericiated. Thanks
Posts.Title: How to make post cancer life as normal as possible.
